lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Finally, he pointed out that auto production accounted for half of the industrial production gain as production of auto assemblies rose to 8.3 million units at an annual rate from 7.5 million units.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Slifer said import prices may rise further as manufacturers' contracts put in place before the dollar dropped to current levels expire, and new contracts are made that reflect a weaker dollar.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "This shows that the impact of energy prices on inflation is behind us in terms of the move from 15 dlrs to 18 dlrs per barrel," said Maria Ramirez of Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc. "
